summary: Flame Atronach armor turned into a black and more metallic armor.
descriptionHtml:
== UPDATE v1.1 ==
- There is now a non-revealing version available
- Fixed body glossiness

== DESCRIPTION ==
Adds in 4 new items into the game:
- Dark Atronach Armor (darkened metallic flame atronach armor)
- Dark Atronach Helmet (gold & ruby circlet)
- Dark Atronach Gloves (daedric gloves retextured and more metallic)
- Dark Atronach Boots (daedric boots retextured and more metallic)

They are HEAVY ARMOR and are based on the Daedric Armor stats and are upgradable.
You can craft them at the forge under the daedric armor tab (no blacksmithing perk needed).

== INSTALLATION ==
1) copy contents to skyrim installation directory
2) start skyrim launcher
3) click data files and enable the DarkAtronach plugin
4a) craft the items in-game using the same materials as you would use for daedric armor
4b) or use console commands to spawn the items (player.additem xxxxxxxx 1)
5) enjoy!

3* if you cannot click the data files option, find out how here:
http://answers.yahoo.com/question/index?qid=20111119180622AAzkDCS

4a* for a list of materials needed check this link:
http://www.uesp.net/wiki/Skyrim:Daedric_Armor#Daedric_Armor

4b* to find the item codes, open the console with ~ and type in the following:
help \"dark atronach\" 0
    you wil get 4 results each with an item code
author: wvh
